items.content_html: A lightweight, user-friendly to-do list application for managing daily tasks efficiently. Features include adding, editing, and deleting tasks, with a clean and minimalist interface. Ideal for learning or as a base project for further enhancements.

Features include adding, editing, and deleting tasks, with a clean and minimalist interface. Ideal for learning or as a base project for further enhancements.

items.content_html: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management web application built with Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and SQLite. This app allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, with an intuitive interface that supports dark and light themes. It features optimistic UI updates, real-time notifications, and automatic task deletion after
items.title: Keyyard/today-note-app: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management web application built with Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and SQLite. It features optimistic UI updates, real-time notifications, and automatic task deletion after
